summary: A black and bloody Irish comedy about a sad train journey where an older man, whose wife has died that morning, encounters a strange and possibly psychotic young oddball....
cast: Brendan Gleeson|Rúaidhrí Conroy|David Wilmot|Aisling O'Sullivan|Gary Lydon|Domhnall Gleeson|David Murray|Tadgh Conroy|David Pearse|Ann McFarlane|John Wallace|Richard Nisbet|Mick Horan
title: Six Shooter
